    • find

      private int find​(Account account)
      Finds the account in the parameter in the bank database
      Parameters:
      account - - the account that needs to be found
      Returns:
      - the index of the account in the array if found, -1 otherwise.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      This is a helper method that grows the bank database by 5

    • add

      This method is used to add an account to the account database

      Returns:
      - true if account was added, false otherwise

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Account account)
      Removes the account from the bank database
      Parameters:
      account - - the account that needs to be removed from the database
      Returns:
      - true if the account was removed, false otherwise

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
      This method deposits some amount of money in the account that was passed as argument
      Parameters:
      account - - the account to which the money should be deposited
      amount - - the amount that needs to be deposited
      Returns:
      - true if the amount was deposited, false otherwise

    • withdrawal

      public int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
      Withdraws some amount of money from the account passed in the argument
      Parameters:
      account - - the account from which the money should be withdrawn
      amount - - the amount that needs to be withdrawn
      Returns:
      - 0: withdrawal successful, 1: insufficient funds, -1 account doesnâ€™t exist
